rp.foggypalegarden.description: Adds fog to the Pale Garden biome
rpo.foggypalegarden.fogRadius.tooltip: How far the fog extends (1 disables radius changes)
rpo.foggypalegarden.fogFade.tooltip: Smoothness of fog transition (0 for no fade, 1 for default)
rpo.foggypalegarden.minSkyLight.tooltip: Fog clears when brightness falls below this value (useful to disable fog in caves)
rpo.foggypalegarden.maxHeight.tooltip: Fog clears above this height (so it wonâ€™t interfere with flying over the biome)
